column2: Jebel Ali Power and Desalination Plant(German)

column7: Largest operational nuclear power station as of January 2020.
Largest power station in North America since 1949.
Uprated from 6,408MWe to 6,430MWe in July 2019, with a target capacity of 7,000MWe by mid-2033.
